basics.name: Yocxy De la Cruz Miguez
basics.label: Computer Science Engineer with +10 years of experience
basics.summary: I am a Computer Science Engineer with a deep understanding of software development, network administration, and economic systems. I am proficient in technologies like Java, ASP.NET, C#, PHP, and SQL. Over the years, I have worked with multinational companies and local businesses, improving their IT infrastructure. I'm AWS certified, and highly skilled in database management and IT security. Currently, I am focusing on enhancing my skills in cloud technologies and backend systems.
